seller_description: Pedigree Dentastix is a healthy and tasty oral care dog treat, recommended by vets to support your furry friend's dental hygiene. Made with quality ingredients like Zinc Sulphate and Sodium Tripolyphosphate, it promotes strong teeth and gums while reducing tartar build-up by up to 80%. The unique X-shape and abrasive texture help clean hard-to-reach teeth, ensuring optimal gum health. Suitable for adult medium breeds (10-25 kg, 4 months and older), this treat is free from artificial colors, flavors, and sugars, making it a safe and effective choice for your dog's oral care. Available in a convenient tin.
review: the price of Pedigree Dentastix Oral Care Treats for Medium Breed Adult Dogs (10-25kg), 7 Sticks, 180g Weekly Pack had increased. My dog loves these treats and they help keep his teeth clean, but I can no longer afford them. The increased price is just too high
expected-output: Seller's Description: Pedigree Dentastix is marketed as a healthy and tasty oral care treat for dogs, recommended by vets for promoting dental hygiene. It is made with quality ingredients like Zinc Sulphate and Sodium Tripolyphosphate, aiming to promote strong teeth and gums while reducing tartar build-up by up to 80%. The product features an X-shape and abrasive texture for cleaning hard-to-reach teeth and ensuring optimal gum health. Suitable for adult medium breeds, it is free from artificial colors, flavors, and sugars and is available in tin packaging.Buyer's Review: The buyer is satisfied with the product’s effectiveness in keeping their dog’s teeth clean and their dog’s enjoyment of the treats. However, they are dissatisfied with the increased price, finding it too expensive to continue purchasing.Analysis: The seller delivers on the product’s promised benefits of promoting oral health and being free from harmful additives. However, the price increase has negatively impacted the buyer’s willingness to repurchase, creating dissatisfaction.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
